original_sentence: obvious is what is a cryptocurrency? So this word was kind of invented 10 years ago when, I don't know how many of you know the origin story of where Bitcoin came from, but basically a pseudonym on the internet dropped a paper and some open source code in a forum on an email list and said, hey, I have this idea for this thing called Bitcoin. It's kind of like electronic cash. Here's how I think it could work. And here is some code if you want to run it and become part of this peer-to-peer network. We don't know who this person is.

summaries.FRE=10: A pseudonym created Bitcoin 10 years ago by sharing a paper, code, and idea for electronic cash online, inviting people to join a peer-to-peer network. The person's identity is unknown.
summaries.FRE=20: Bitcoin began 10 years ago when a pseudonym shared a paper, open-source code, and an idea for electronic cash online, asking others to join a peer-to-peer network. The person remains unidentified.
summaries.FRE=30: Bitcoin was invented 10 years ago by a pseudonymous person who posted a paper and code online, proposing electronic cash and a peer-to-peer network. The person's identity is unknown.
summaries.FRE=40: About 10 years ago, Bitcoin was created when a pseudonym shared a paper and open-source code in an online forum, suggesting it as electronic cash and inviting others to join a peer-to-peer network. The creator's identity is unknown.
summaries.FRE=50: Bitcoin started 10 years ago when a person using a pseudonym posted a paper and code online, describing it as electronic cash and encouraging people to run the code to join a peer-to-peer network. The person's identity is unknown.
summaries.FRE=60: Around 10 years ago, Bitcoin was created by a pseudonymous individual who shared a paper, open-source code, and idea for electronic cash online, inviting others to join a peer-to-peer network. The person's identity is still unknown.
summaries.FRE=70: Bitcoin was created about 10 years ago when a pseudonym posted a paper and code online, proposing it as electronic cash and inviting people to join a peer-to-peer network. The person's identity is unknown.
summaries.FRE=80: Bitcoin started 10 years ago when a pseudonym shared a paper and code online, introducing it as electronic cash and inviting others to join a peer-to-peer network. The person is unknown.
summaries.FRE=90: Bitcoin was made 10 years ago by a pseudonym who posted a paper and code online, describing it as electronic cash and inviting people to join a peer-to-peer network. The person is unknown.
summaries.FRE=100: Bitcoin was created 10 years ago by someone using a fake name who shared a paper and code online, calling it e-cash and inviting others to join a network. The person's identity is unknown.
